Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to certain reporting requirements
Summary: Relates to reporting requirements for full-time jobs where an individual is employed by a qualified participant for at least thirty-five hours a week and project hires; provides such report shall include the number of permanent full-time jobs, the number of permanent part-time jobs, the number of full-time equivalents, and the number of project hires.
LawSection: New York State Urban Development Corporation Act
